! Nun Zris Silence: You met Solin? Finally, it will be able to leave this world. As, indeed, I do. But for you is only a beginning, although you have done so much. You were able to learn the truth about the Seven Seals and stop Embryo. There are only one case in which I can help you. But before you go to it, I would like to thank you for what you have given me peace and Solin.
